text: Warm welcome, friendly, peaceful place to worship. Surely back when in Singapore
Attending this SDA Church while on vacation in Singapore was the overall best experience, where the church members were all very welcoming and was also blessed by the singing and message shared.

Second time visited this church during occasional Singapore trips.
We had a great discussion during bible study hour and the sermon was a wonderful personal testimony of the speaker. The mission updates and testimonies are great, too.
May God continue to bless His people here.
Amen
Feels like am free and nothing to worry about... So much happy to be there always
The warmest and friendliest SDA Church I've ever been to. Simple, genuine Christians. Very pleasant atmosphere of worship.
